mapper.sql: id, xs_id, zhcj, zxf, lwcj, sfsc, cjsj, cjr, gxsj, gxr
mapper.select: select txc.*, xs.id as xs_id, xs.xh, xs.xm, xs.yzy, xs.yx, txkc.id as xs_kc_cj_id, txkc.xs_cj_id, txkc.kc_id, txkc.kclx, txkc.yzyxf, txkc.dqxf, txkc.cj, txkc.cjsx, txkc.bkcj, txkc.bz, kc.kcdm, kc.kcmc, kc.kcxs, kc.kcxf, kc.sfbx, pc.pch from t_xs_cj txc left join t_xs_kc_cj txkc on (txc.id=txkc.xs_cj_id) left join t_xs xs on (txc.xs_id=xs.id) left join t_kc kc on (kc.id=txkc.kc_id) left join t_pc_xs tpx on (tpx.xs_id=xs.id) left join t_pc pc on (pc.id=tpx.pc_id and pc.id=txc.pc_id) where txc.sfsc = false and txkc.sfsc = false and xs.sfsc = false and pc.sfsc = false and kc.sfsc = false and pc.id = #{pcId} and txc.xs_id = #{xsId} and xs.xh like concat('%',trim(#{xh}),'%') and xs.xm like concat('%',trim(#{xm}),'%') and xs.yx like concat('%',trim(#{yx}),'%') order by txc.cjsj desc

select txc.*, pc.pch, xs.xm, xs.xh, xs.yx from t_xs_cj txc left join t_xs xs on (txc.xs_id=xs.id) left join t_pc_xs tpx on (tpx.xs_id=xs.id) left join t_pc pc on (pc.id=tpx.pc_id and pc.id=txc.pc_id) where txc.sfsc = false and xs.sfsc = false and pc.sfsc = false and pc.id = #{pcId} and txc.type = 2 and xs.xh like concat('%',trim(#{xh}),'%') and xs.xm like concat('%',trim(#{xm}),'%') and xs.yx like concat('%',trim(#{yx}),'%') order by txc.cjsj desc
select count(id) from t_xs_cj txc where txc.xs_id = #{xsId} and txc.sfsc = false and txc.sfxf = true and txc.sfck = false
